import React from "react"; import { Grid, Row, Col } from "react-flexbox-grid/dist/react-flexbox-grid"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import ProgressiveImage from "react-progressive-image"; import styles from "./index.scss"; import { Box, Heading, Text } from "grommet"; const Intro = () => { const margin = "medium"; const sectionMargin = { vertical: "12rem" }; return (
{(src, loading) => ( )} expand the art space. For artists Show your work in your studio when and how you like. For art lovers and collectors Explore new artists and visit their studios or show your own collection. How it works? 1. Add your studio or space 2. Confirm a visit 3. Host someone in your studio What we are preparing in our studio As you are reading this, we are working on adding more core features.
  • Host a one-time mini event in your space
  • Review your visit experience
  • Buy art in the app with a certficate of authencity and arrange professional shipping
  • Organize your art collection
 Ready to give it a try? Discover artists by location or medium and plan a visit to their studios We will help you get in touch with them. Have a studio or a space where you are creative and want to share your finished work? Tell us about it and we will add it.
); }; export default Intro;
